<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server</value></part><part><name/>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Curator </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds or changes curator edit area (depends on if ID is already used). </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> curatorObj '''addCuratorEditingArea''' [editAreaID,position,radius] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [editAreaID,position,radius]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> curatorObj: [[Object]] - Curator module.  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> editAreaID: [[Number]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> position: [[Position]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> radius: [[Number]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myCurator [[addCuratorEditingArea]] [4, [[position]] [[player]], 1000];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Curator]], [[removeCuratorEditingArea]], [[removeAllCuratorEditingAreas]], [[curatorEditingArea]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
